Package it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.resourceLocations

Class StrongBox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.playerBoard.resourceLocations.StrongBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConcreteResourceLocation, ResourceLocation
public class StrongBox extends Object implements ConcreteResourceLocation
StrongBox is the class for the player board's strongbox
